pages.text: $(li)The Ring of Glory makes you recover life every time that you slay a creature.$(br)$(li)It can only be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_keep)Ruined Keep$(/l).$(br)$(li)This ring can't be equipped, you have to hold it in your offhand to active its effects.
